meanings.sent1: The deluge destroyed many homes in the town.
meanings.sent2: The deluge caused the river to overflow its banks.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected deluge turned the street into a river.
meanings.sent4: The deluge of emotions overwhelmed her fragile heart.
meanings.sent5: The deluge of tears washed away his sorrow.

meanings.definition: To overwhelm with a great quantity of something.
meanings.sent1: The news of the accident deluged her with guilt.
meanings.sent2: The company was deluged with orders after the sale.
meanings.sent3: Her inbox was deluged with spam emails.
meanings.sent4: The team was deluged with praise for their hard work.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was deluged with questions from curious students.

meanings.sent1: The deluge outside made it impossible to see the road.
meanings.sent2: We decided to stay indoors during the deluge.
meanings.sent3: The sudden deluge caught us without umbrellas.
meanings.sent4: The deluge of rain filled up the empty buckets in the yard.
meanings.sent5: The deluge drummed on the roof, creating a soothing sound.
